documents.document: @MiguelDelaney And both sides maintain their respective records in the 'Top 6 mini-league', largely confounding recent form!

Shame that #DWTSIrl doesn't have a dance-off - runs risk of being popularity contest rather than dance competition - let the judges decide!
Love that there's a fella playing for Wigan called Max Power - hope his batteries stay fully charged! #MANUvWAFC #FACup
@GNev2 10 changes apiece for Southampton v Arsenal now!
@GNev2 Do you think its a bit more prevalent too cos of fixture congestion in Dec-Jan?
@kenearlys No harm if it precludes the need for squad rotation due to fixture congestion, cos manifestly limited beyond first 11!
Did the commentator just ""say that one of the Wolves players was "in the Icelandic team that beat Liverpool at the Euros"?? #LIVWOL
@kenearlys Klopps talked bout importance of cups, team selection could suggest priorities elsewhere - back in CL, better calibre recruitment
@richardosman Great inspiration for Scrabble!
Fairly baffled at this stage, that Robbie Brady didn't get a move before the beginning of the season, let alone the window now! #legend
@michkeegan Tina's had some absolutely A-mazing frocks in it!
@IrishRugby #futureisnow!
@RevRichardColes Kinda sad that that probably means nothing to anyone under the age of about 30! #womblingfree
@lukefitz11 Losing Jonny and Isa so early hasn't helped...........
@phlaimeaux Cracking tune - he even makes the Herbert pk bandstand look cool! Appara by chance that was last day that cross-Liffey ferry ran
@todayfm @FERGDARCY Death star bar, Jabba the pizza-hut #scififood
@todayfm @FERGDARCY C-3pea0, boba - feta, Obi-one-kenobean #scififood
Kinda glad for @LucasLeiva87 that that match ended 1-0 cos it means his first goal for 7 years was the winner! #PLYLIV
@MiguelDelaney Some of his team mates were probably still in primary school!!
@ArcticChimpanze That Pilates studio, down the block from our famous chipper Borzas! :op
@ArcticChimpanze And Sandymount has just popped up there in Katherine Lynch's vt (Im watching bit behind so I can ff through breaks!)
@ArcticChimpanze Unlike Strictly they must've decided it'll b 2hours all through the run (easier for scheduling) so padded out to max at mo!
@ArcticChimpanze Have to say I'm finding the ad breaks a bit annoying - already one before any of the women have danced!! #DWTSIrl
Great performance from @SMignolet, made some really important saves for @LFC today!
@JohnBishop100 Shame Wjinaldum couldn't put that chance away at the end tho!
@MiguelDelaney *actually just see that Tottenham are +2, still interesting tho!
@MiguelDelaney Goals for & against interesting stat there - Liverpool 12pts only +3, Chelsea with 9 only +1, next 3 -, Arsenal bottom but +!
A game where @LFC fans didn't want the whistle to go, cos the break'll give Man U the opportunity to sort out their defence at set pieces!
Wonder what odds you'd have got on Everton inflicting Pep Guardiola's biggest ever league defeat? #EVEMCI
@cyruschristie Only on the pitch 4 minutes! Incredible composure!
@Realaldo474 Huge day for Alexander-Arnold! Great to see Hendo back - missed his calm midfield stewardship. Couple of super-subs there too!
@MiguelDelaney Dont like singling out players, but other marquee signing last Summer was a defender! Aguero fairly anonymous today tho!
@Carra23 Voice seems to be holding up ok so far - I suspect it may not be the case once 4 o'clock comes! #MUNLIV
Love that @NiallQuinn22 just said 'schmozzle' in commentary! #Youcantakethemanoutofthegaa #EVEMCI
@MiguelDelaney Reckon he's finding this Premiership manager lark a bit more challenging than he anticipated!
@ThisisDavina @ClaudiaWinkle @emmafreud Were you at a fringe festival?
@RichieSadlier Mid-season transfer window is de-stabilising, partic for smaller clubs. V different if could only sign out-of-contract player
@GaryBarlow I've been singing 'Shine' around the house all day today, can't work out why?
What an impressive Leinster performance! Great to see foot kept to the pedal for the full 80. Reasserting ourselves in Europe! #LEIvMON
Must be close to a record European score against a French team now? #LEIvMON
Pretty sickening to see how often Johnny Sexton is targeted by other teams - the man is some warrior tho! #LEIvMON
@BrianODriscoll Great start from the lads!
@RichieSadlier Not a huge surprise from the little I've heard around the subject. Prob a full episode in that whole issue - long way to go!
@NTS_Fiona I like that (s)he has coordinated their jacket with their fur!
@RichieSadlier @lukefitz11 @SecondCaptains V interesting on issues affecting players careers - no mention of any club transition support?
@SecondCaptains @RichieSadlier Do you think the expanded World Cup format will be a good or a bad thing for countries like Ireland?
@GaryBarlow Does Alice make a special guest appearance? #wonderland
@Carra23 Hit like an arrow and his foot is the bow! #magicmessi
@MarianKeyes People will be fierce jealous to find out that in Ireland we'll have celeb dance competitions to watch nearly all year round!
@GaryBarlow Watched and enjoyed in Dublin Gary! #letitshine
@GaryBarlow Enjoyed the show tonight, how many stars do you reckon you'd have got if you''d auditioned as a teenager? ;0) #Letitshine
@MaiaDunphy Dry Gin or Dry white wine perhaps?
@MarianKeyes No it is Sunday, just a 'behind the scenes' programme tonight
@ArcticChimpanze Ooh, missed another one whilst watching the rugby. Hard to know which to watch now tho, cos both fairly done & dusted now!
Just switched to #WHUvMCI for half-time in the rugby, saw 3 goals. Now time for the second half! #LEIvZEB
@GaryBarlow How many audition weeks until the live shows Gary?
@MiguelDelaney Chelsea and Tottenham have one less game now each in the 'mini league' too, if you're looking at poss "Top 6, 6-pointers"!
@Carra23 Very solid at the back too, only conceded 14 to Liverpool's 23!
@Carra23 Similar to Wijnaldum's against City I thought! #TOTCHE
@richardosman You should do it like the old football league tables, with little cardboard tags to slot into a table...........
@MiguelDelaney you're telling me! That inconsistency is the final hurdle to overcome - need a good central defender to boss at the back!
@MiguelDelaney Hard to know how to read those stats given Liverpool have gained most pts against top 6 and lost most pts against the rest!
@MarianKeyes I can't drink 7up anymore - drank too much of it flat as a child for tummy bugs!
@ArcticChimpanze I got 100% too, too easy! #loveabiccie :0p
Phil Jones reaction to Feghoulis tackle reminds me of John Giles observation-If really injured ud stay still not roll multiple times #WHUMUN
@KimCattrall Might like 2 know - 1st song at final whistle at Anfield after win v Man City last night-Starship, Nothing's gonna stop us now!
@ArcticChimpanze Would need to be mega-organised alright! ;op
@ArcticChimpanze I got one of those almost a year in advance too - bonkers!
@GaryBarlow Looking forward to seeing you all in Dublin next year! Nollaig Shona Duit!
@hotpatooties Its a herd of Cows!
Now that was a BIG 3 points! Is that what you call scoring in Jurgie Time?? #EVELIV
What a summer it was! https://t.co/ql1ddSOJdg
@richardosman like a fish needs a bicycle kinda thing??
@MarianKeyes Being in danceoff in semi v bad sign when its all public votes next week & bit of previous dance experience may go agin Danny 2
@MarianKeyes Dont think its 100% so, Danny & Oti looked rattled! Claudia's quickstep was FAB!
@MarianKeyes It could be a double-Clifton final! #siblingrivalry
@MarianKeyes Ever happened before, some1's first EVER dance-off is the semi-final? Both seemed gobsmacked, have to pick it up for danceoff!
@grahnort Just catching up now - excellent couch last night Mr Norton! (the guests that is, not the furniture...)
@BrianODriscoll @leinsterrugby Need someone with a cool head for those key moments in tight encounters........
What are the bets, having finished top of CL group for first time in years, Arsenal will now get Real Madrid in the draw? #ChampionsLeague
@Schofe @imacelebrity Just rounds off the series so beautifully!#Imacelebthecomingoutshow
@antanddec Does someone have to cook the bushtucker??
@antanddec 16 finals but no win - don't think there's a footie team with a record as bad as that lads!
@antanddec Is this the first series no Celeb has said "Im a celebrity get me out of here" during a trial??
@MarianKeyes Rumour has it they were rewarded with balloon animals after a good dress rehearsal!
@RossOCK No joke, he's barely stopped for 2 hours and thrown himself headlong into it!
@eoincmacken Catch it on the Player! Official start of the Irish festive season.........
@eoincmacken Not to rub it in, but the Late Late Toy Show is on at the moment.....
Cue Dermot Bannon #LateLateToyShow
An audience of grown adults just clapped a batttery-operated toy! :0D #LateLateToyShow
@RossOCK Not sure dubes are that seasonal tho?
@daraobriain So what IS your name then not-Dara O Briain?
@IrishRugby What a come-back! Well done!
@MaiaDunphy I woke up with the realisation its TOY SHOW day - YAY!!! #bestofirishtv
@SimonDelaneyEsq Ah, I see its confirmed now, sad news #manuel
@antanddec That'll round off the series nicely. Think we all needed a happy harmonious camp this year! Thank you!!
@richardosman How do you know its a malteser?
